name: Symbios (cactus_bomb)
description:
Symbios is a science fiction top-down shooter set in a post-apocalyptic future earth. A virus called the Infestoid Virus has taken over earth and mutated all life into vicious creatures called Infestoids. The Infestoid hordes rage across the world infecting all natural life.

To escape the virus, the last remaining humans transformed their bodies into machines to escape the virus and continue the fight against the hordes. The machines are known as Symbios. Machine bodies with human minds, they require energy only obtained by hunting down and killing Infestoids.

You are a Symbios machine and must fight your way to the last known location of the human race and a possible cure.
